attributes.action: reduce the cost of fuel duty so we pay the same as the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to ask the goverment to reduce the cost we are paying on the fuel duty and bring it to the same cost as the EU .
We are paying to much tax on our fuel cost with the cost of road tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
